uint8_t additionalLatency
 

Detailed Description

SDRAM configuration structure.

This structure provides configuration settings for the attached SDRAM device(s). A pointer to this structure is specified in the CSL_EmifConfig structure.

Field Documentation

[IN] Additional latency

[IN] Burst length in bytes

[IN] CAS latency

[IN] Configuration of SDRAM device

uint8_t CSL_EmifSdramParms::numBankGroups

[IN] Number of SDRAM bank groups (DDR4 only)

uint8_t CSL_EmifSdramParms::numBanks

[IN] Number of SDRAM banks

uint8_t CSL_EmifSdramParms::numColBits

[IN] Number of SDRAM column bits

uint8_t CSL_EmifSdramParms::numRanks

[IN] Number of SDRAM ranks

uint8_t CSL_EmifSdramParms::numRowBits

[IN] Number of SDRAM row bits

uint16_t CSL_EmifSdramParms::sdramDataWidth

[IN] Width (in bits) of the SDRAM data bus (64, 32, or 16 (excludes ECC))

CSL_EmifSdramType CSL_EmifSdramParms::type

[IN] Type of SDRAM device
